name: RealPress – Real Estate Plugin
author: ThimPress

sections.description:
Build a Real Estate website is not an easy thing and that is why RealPress was born. Friendly interface, easy to use and has all necessary functions for you to build a Real Estate website in minutes. This plugin is designed for estate project, house, office, building, apartment, condominium, villa, luxury real estate… RealPress completely fits for real estate agents, real estate companies, real estate brokers, architects, construction companies, design companies, and more.

Demo | Documentation | Support
RealPress Theme

This plugin is designed for estate projects, house, office, building, apartment, condominium, villa, luxury real estate… RealPress completely fits for real estate agents, real estate companies, real estate brokers, architects, construction companies, design companies, and more.

Awesome Products from ThimPress:

#1 LMS WordPress Plugin | LearnPress.
#1 Education WordPress Theme | Eduma.
Minimal Multipurpose Shopify Theme | Storepify.

Features

1.  Fully compatible with any version of WordPress.
2.  List view and grid view.
3.  Flexible to change URL’s slug, SEO friendly.
4.  Advanced search.
5.  Gallery, Video, 360 Virtual Tour.
6.  Email notification.
7.  Nearby places.
8.  Agent management.
9.  Become an agent.
10. Taxonomy management for property.
11. Compatible with OpenStreetMap.
12. Add custom fields for taxonomy.
13. Fully responsive.
14. Compatible with Contact Form 7.
15. Import property demo data.
16. Quick installation via WinRAR setup.
sections.changelog:
1.0.7 (2023-12-27)

~ Validate step price.
~ Added: widgets single, archive property for Elementor.
~ Tweak: js agent property.

1.0.6 (2023-10-23)

~ Removed: invalid phone number in Become an Agent form and Contact form.
~ Added: default meta description for Yoast Seo plugin.

1.0.5 (2023-07-21)

~ Tweak: advanced search enter keyword handle.

1.0.4 (2023-06-02)

~ Tweak: support categories of RealPress to max level 3.
~ Tweak: hide if the info empty of “Walkscore”, “360 Virtual Tour”, “What’s NearBy”, “Floor Plans” .

1.0.3 (2023-02-24)

~ Fixed: currency.
~ Optimized: performance.
~ Fixed: import demo.

1.0.2 (2023-02-15)

~ Modified: compare and wishlist.
~ Modified: styles.
~ Modified: price.

1.0.1 (2022-12-29)

~ Modified: styles backend, frontend.
~ Added: new feature google map.
~ Removed include: font awesome.
~ Fixed: error Agent property on “Archive Agent” page.
~ Modified: text grammar.
~ Added: new feature search Suggest.
~ Added: Schema for Breadcrumb.
~ Fixed: Agent can’t delete media of another user.
~ Added: option display list/grid on “Archive Property” page.

1.0.0 (2022-08-15)

~ Initial release.
